randomized control trial so it's like a very rigorous experimental method um you don't often see it in applied research
and certainly not in applied software research but that's what we did and so basically we like put out an open call
it was like Hey like do you experience code of view anxiety like come join this study and like learn how to manage it um
and basically folks get randomized to one of two conditions a control condition or like the treatment condition and then ideally folks in the

what we found um it was only like a 2hour workshop intervention so this is
like kind of a common method to use in mental health experiences which you're trying to like reach a bunch of people

that I delivered these workshops and workshop had like several major
